welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Sandiacre, known for its beautiful green spaces, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport serves exclusively military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a password is required for access.
